_documentation.description: Configuration file for LLVM Issues Viewer

tabs_format.id: Unique identifier for the tab (used in URLs and CSS)
tabs_format.label: Display name shown on the tab button
tabs_format.keywords: Array of search terms (use empty array [] for all items in repo)
tabs_format.blacklist: Optional per-tab array of terms to exclude (overrides global)
tabs_format.description: Description shown in the info box above the list

global_settings.blacklist: Array of terms to exclude from ALL tabs (unless tab has its own blacklist)

examples.all_issues_from_repo: Set keywords to [] to show all open issues/PRs
examples.filtered_issues: Set keywords to ['AMDGPU', 'AMDGCN'] to filter by those terms
examples.exclude_mlir: Global blacklist ['MLIR'] excludes all MLIR-related items

tabs.label: AMDGPU Issues
tabs.description: Open issues containing AMDGPU or AMDGCN in title or labels.

tabs.label: SPIR-V Issues
tabs.description: Open issues containing SPIR-V or SPIRV in title or labels.

tabs.description: Open PRs containing AMDGPU or AMDGCN in title or labels.

tabs.description: Open PRs containing SPIR-V or SPIRV in title or labels.
